body_html: @FrederickGeek8 That sounds reasonable. I just (re-)installed bazel today and I'm fairly certain it did not compile from source (it was way too fast and didn't output a whole lot to stdout). I'll try doing a manual installation of bazel at some point and see what happens.

body: @FrederickGeek8 That sounds reasonable. I just (re-)installed bazel today and I'm fairly certain it did *not* compile from source (it was way too fast and didn't output a whole lot to stdout). I'll try doing a manual installation of bazel at some point and see what happens.
